short_summary: Reissuing a bid for a contract for the rehabilitation of Kingston Mills Locks
description: This contract will involve the rehabilitation of the Kingston Mills Locks at the Rideau Canal. Through this project, the contractor must restore the locks to a condition which allows safe and reliable lockages.
duration_in_months: They have 14 months to complete this project
full_summary:
# Rideau Canal Kingston Mills Locks 46-49 Rehabilitation

## Official Notice
This is a reissue of the government tender announcement for the rehabilitation of the Rideau Canal Kingston Mills Locks 46-49. The solicitation number is WS3975159007, and the document number is 4267669810.

## Tender Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3975159007
- **Document Number**: 4267669810
- **Publication Date**: October 23, 2023
- **Closes**: November 17, 2023 14:00 EST
- **Revised**: November 14, 2023

## Project Description
The Real Property Branch of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a qualified contractor to carry out rehabilitation works at the Kingston Mills Locks 46-49 on the Rideau Canal. The project must be completed by May 15, 2025.

## Procurement Details
- ** Procurement Category**: Construction
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding (Open)
- **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Delivery Location**: Kingston, ON

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
- **Name**: Carter Gooch (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: [carter.gooch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carter.gooch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: None
- **Fax**: None
- **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17799147?extsite=MTc3OTkxNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17799147?extsite=MTc3OTkxNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Important Notes
Please note that the closing time for submission has been revised to 14:00 EST on the response deadline date. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive. For further details, please refer to the SAP Ariba Discovery posting and the Ariba RFx Event. Some suppliers will be invited directly to submit a bid.
